metadata.name: Bob Marley
metadata.description:
Robert Nesta Marley  was a Jamaican singer, musician, and songwriter. Considered one of the pioneers of reggae, his musical career was marked by fusing elements of reggae, ska, and rocksteady, as well as his distinctive vocal and songwriting style.
Marley's contributions to music increased the visibility of Jamaican music worldwide, and made him a global figure in popular culture to this day.

as an artist and a creative Bob`s music is a go to every time i feel down or need some encouragement, i grew up to my Dad playing his famous albums during the weekends and till this day its always a delight every time his songs comes on.

Bob Marley stood tall as a music icon, a revolutionist and a Pan-Africanism figure.

the collector of these piece would get the framed physical piece accompanied with a certificate of authenticity.

medium; Ballpoint pen and acrylic on paper with lots of LOVE.
                                                                           Foreversammy
